Friends fear worst as docs order her to cancel show

FAITH Hill is secretly battling throat cancer, worried friends fear, after the country queen lost her voice and was forced to cancel a concert!

Now, pals have revealed the singer’s devoted husband, Tim McGraw, is terrified that he’ll lose her to the dreaded disease!

“Tim is beside himself,” confided an insider.

“Both he and Faith are concerned that if her condition gets any worse, her golden voice will be silenced for good!”

Pals close to the first couple of country music believe years of touring have taken a serious toll on Faith.

Loved ones don’t need to push the panic button, a rep insisted, but they fear the worst after doctors ordered Faith to cancel a big show in the middle of the couple’s mammoth Soul2Soul tour.

It was during their stop in Little Rock, Ark., on Aug. 3, when Faith was immediately placed on vocal rest.

On the night of the show, it was announced the 49-year-old mother of three “under doctor’s advisement . . . has been put on two days of vocal rest.”

Dr. Stuart Fischer, a prominent New York internist who hasn’t treated Faith, told The National ENQUIRER:

“Throat cancer does affect the vocal cords early on in the disease.
